definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Kill some worry about Judgment Time.
sentences.chinese: 解除一些關於末日審判的擔心。

sentences.english: It is not hard to see the reasons for celebrating the end of the line for has-been leaders.
sentences.chinese: 對昔日領導人的末日進行慶祝的原因並不難理解。

sentences.english: This will happen only if and when the Rapture happens.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，我們當且僅當末日審判發生時才需要做這些。

sentences.english: His book The End of Sparta will appear in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 他執筆的《斯巴達的末日》一書將於2011年出版。

sentences.english: In fact, Conway reused Carroll's method as part of the doomsday algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，康威在他的末日算法中重用了卡羅爾的方法。

sentences.english: But you cannot imagine the end of capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 然而，你卻無法想像資本主義的末日。

sentences.english: Is the clock of doom ticking for mankind?
sentences.chinese: 是人類末日的鐘聲在滴答作響嗎？

sentences.english: It's not the end of the world . Not until I say so , anyway.
sentences.chinese: 世界末日還沒到，除非是由我親口說的纔算。

sentences.english: But to me it was the end of the world, as I had known it.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我早已經知道，但這對我來說就是世界末日。

sentences.english: There are dozens of theories about how this might happen.
sentences.chinese: 有許多理論描述了世界末日是如何到來的。

sentences.english: Stock markets rallied as a form of relief from possible Armageddon.
sentences.chinese: 美國股市在避免了一場可能的末日浩劫之後出現反彈。

sentences.english: Past doomsday prophecies have often relied on religious beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 況且，過去世界末日的預言往往基於宗教信仰。

sentences.english: It must have looked and sounded like the end of the world.
sentences.chinese: 肯定好像世界末日來臨了一樣。

sentences.english: If we're looking at a similar mortality rate, that's the end of the Minoans.
sentences.chinese: 如果是同樣的死亡率，那就是邁諾安人的末日。

sentences.english: They have very high mortality rates. They are sort of the doomsday-scenario bugs.
sentences.chinese: 他們有很高的致死率，他們是那種世界末日病菌。

sentences.english: But would such a sleight of hand really stand up to legal scrutiny in the aftermath of Armageddon?
sentences.chinese: 但這種戲法真的經得起末日審判的法律審查嗎？

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
